table: Project expenditures not yet in use

context: 5. Property and Equipment, Net Property and equipment at March 31, 2019 and 2018 is as follows: Total depreciation expense on property and equipment was $2.5 million, $2.6 million, and $2.4 million during fiscal 2019, 2018 and 2017, respectively. The Company capitalizes internal-use software, including software used exclusively in providing services or that is only made available to customers as a software service, as property and equipment under ASC 350-40, Internal-Use Software. Total amortization expense on capitalized internal-use software was $2.5 million, $1.8 million and $1.4 million during fiscal 2019, 2018, and 2017, respectively.
questions: What was the depreciation amount in 2019?
What was the depreciation amount in 2018?
What was the total amortization expense on capitalized internal-use software in 2019?
What was the increase / (decrease) in the Furniture and equipment from 2018 to 2019?
What was the average Furniture and equipment for 2018 and 2019?
What was the average leasehold improvements for 2018 and 2019?
